item.title: Getting Started With Julia
item.description: Getting into a new programming language is always a bit overwhelming, because there are so many places to start! Here is a short list of things I like to send to people new to Julia, aimed at varying skill levels: Learn X in Y Minutes - Julia edition, a good quick tour if you already know other languages like python pretty well Towards Julia 1.0, by David Sanders, is a great tutorial for the latest versions of Julia.
